name: OpenTekhnia
tag_list: simulation, system-test, embedded-systems, python, android, flash, flex, air
overview:
OpenTekhnia is a french start-up that develops and sells solutions for complex systems simulation, integration and test. Recently it started developing mobile applications, first around the simulation world, then targeting a larger market with entertainment applications, all this based on its knowledge of the Adobe AIR/Flash RDA/RIA and mobile technologies.
The main product, developed with a partner (Techniware eurl), is Open System Simulation Solutions (O3S), a full system simulation solution based on distributed data services driven by python scripts and able to run any C/C++ simulation model. The O3S product has been chosen by General Electric Transportation for its innovative railways and CBTC projects as the main system simulation solution.
